you
[Music]
hi and welcome you listening to the x-22
report my name is Dave and this is
episode 1579 b and today's date is May
29th 2018 and the title of the episode
is control is the name of the game in
the end who will have the control let's
get into the economic collapse political
and geopolitical news now it seems like
the North Korean summit that's going to
be held in Singapore it looks like it is
a go as of right now looks like the June
12th summit is going to move forward
here and we can see that Washington is
preparing for this and we see North
Korea is preparing for this South Korea
is preparing for this and kim jeong-hoon
he is sent one of his top aides to New
York to meet with US officials this is
kim yeongcheol
this is the former head of North Korea's
spy agency he's the highest-ranking
North Korean official to visit the u.s.
since 2000 and we see right now that
everything is in motion
and the representatives are all
preparing for this and I do believe
what's going to happen eventually is
that the north and the south they're
going to be unified the border wall is
going to be taking down the one belt one
road is going to be built we're gonna
see commerce with China
we're gonna see commerce with Russia and
all of this is being done for a specific
reason
the entire economic system is breaking
down right now
the dollar is dying the new system which
is most likely going to be China because
they have all the manufacturing they
duplicated everything here that we have
in the West they have gold they've been
purchasing a lot of gold Russia has been
person purchasing a lot of gold they've
been moving away from the dollar trading
with other countries not in the dollar
they've been making bilateral trade
agreements with many many different
countries and we can see this is ongoing
they've been preparing for this for
quite a while the only question is will
the central bankers control all of this
or will they break free from the central
banking system and I do believe in the
end that is the plan to break free from
the central banking system because as we
know Trump
as Andrew Jackson hanging on his wall
and yes I've said that many many times
the reason why he has this I think this
is the ultimate plan is to get rid of
the central banking system there is no
need for it there is no reason for it
they do not help the system they destroy
the system to benefit themselves now we
see a lot of countries where they are
purchasing hardware and I should say
military assets from Russia and I think
this is being done on purpose I mean we
see India right now we've also seen many
other countries purchasing the s400
anti-missile defense system and I
believe once these countries start to
break away and not use the dollar they
want to protect themselves from the deep
state now remember the deep state still
has power the deep state still has the
ability to have events the deep state
still controls the corporate media and
they want full control they don't want
to give up control and they're not going
to give up control that easily they're
gonna fight to the very very end but we
see there are many countries out there
India Turkey Egypt and many others that
have been purchasing weapons from Russia
plus they've seen how weapon Russia's
weapons shared with Syria and many of
the countries are looking at this saying
hey they're pretty good let me get some
of this and we see already that Turkey
they might purchase the russian sukhoi
su-7 fifth-generation fighter they're
supposed to have a deal with the u.s. to
purchase the f-35 fighter but once again
Turkey is pivoting away from the US
they're looking and they purchased the
SU 300 it looks like they're looking to
purchase the Russian fighter and we see
a lot of countries they will be pivoting
away from the US from the dying dollar
this is the endgame that we've seen in
the past where countries move away they
do a balancing act between the dollar
and whatever currency they're going to
use or whatever country they're gonna
work with and the US and they slowly
move away from the US because they're
protecting themselves and
is what we're seeing right now we see
out in Syria the Syrian state-run media
they are accusing the u.s. Intel
intelligence agencies of staging fake
chemical attacks and we know this
already we know the white helmets we
know the terrorist groups they all been
staging these chemical attacks and
they're saying that the US intelligence
services they're continuing to organize
staged operations with chemical weapons
against Syrians and they're talking
about the United Kingdom they're talking
about France they're talking about the
United States and they have evidence
right now of the intelligence agencies
staging everything actually there's
there they're photographing they have
the evidence of where they are staging
all this Russia when the chemical the
false flag chemical attacks took place
they also warned everyone that these
were being staged and we've known this
for a very long time that these chemical
weapons attacks they were complete fake
phony and false there were that there
were some that were real but it was the
terrorists that were using the sarin gas
it was the terrorists that we that was
used in the chlorine gas and most of the
time the OPCW never inspected these
areas because these attacks took place
in the terrorists areas and they
couldn't get access the latest attack
took place in a Syrian Russian
controlled area that was the big
difference this time where Russia
basically took that whole entire area
protected it to make sure the OPCW can
come in there and they even allowed
reporters to come into this area to
inspect and most of the reporters there
I would say almost all of them said they
don't see any signs of any chemical
attack they spoke to many people around
the area and that whole narrative that
was put forth by the deep state
completely fell apart and that was the
big difference this time that this took
place in a Russian Syrian controlled
area and we see right now that the deep
State the intelligence operatives
they're not going to stop remember they
never stop they always continually push
their goal to the very very end
we see right now Syria Russia they want
the foreign troops out of Syria and the
Syrian army they are now pushing the
Turkish troops out of Latakia they're
pushing them north back into Turkey and
it started out as shells being fired
back and forth and this escalated and
now it looks like the Syrian army is now
pushing Turkey out of their country we
see us Jordan they agreed to hold
meetings with Russia on the stirrin
southern zone of the escalation remember
Lavrov came out and said listen we
agreed to set up this de-escalation zone
in the southern part of Syria because
eventually what was going to happen is
the foreign troops were going to leave
Syria and yes this is still on schedule
the troops will be leaving Syria now
this is the plan can anything else
happen of course plans always change but
this is the plan and it seems like it's
moving forward and this is why Putin
came out and said all foreign troops
must leave including Iran and of course
this is the last part piece of the
puzzle of why the deep state is staying
in there because they're saying Iran is
in there if you remove Iran guess what
there is no reason for the troops to
stay in there and this is what the deep
State has been using for a very long
time if we go back to 2013 2014 when we
had the chemical weapons attack in Syria
and Putin came out and said listen
instead of invading because remember the
fleet was there in the Mediterranean
they were ready to go in there to bomb
Obama said they crossed a red line and
Putin came out and said listen if Assad
gets rid of the chemical weapons will
you be okay with this now basically what
was happening at that time is the u.s.
the deep state they were losing traction
on the story they were losing the
narrative of the story because
investigations have found out that the
shells were fired from the rebel area
the moderate rebels it was not fired
from the Assad controlled areas and the
story started to fall apart
so they went along with Putin's
plan and basically he stopped the entire
US force from going into Syria but again
this didn't stop the deep state
they just regrouped and tried again and
eventually with Obama in office they did
get US troops in Syria they were able to
fly missions in Syria bombing and
allowing the Islamic state to gain
additional ground all they did was
create another terrorist group having
flood into Iraq then into Syria and we
see right now that everything has
completely changed the Islamic state is
beaten al Qaeda pretty much gone
al-nusra pretty much gone the moderate
rebels being bused out of the country
and we see that the Syrian armed forces
are ready to mount a major offensive in
the southern part of Syria and we this
is in the provinces of Daraa and we
could see Israel is on the opposite side
where they're ready to counter these
offensives and what is happening right
now is that the Syrian government
doesn't care about anything except
taking back their country and it was
taken from them and they want it back
just like the northern part turkey took
part of it the southern part Israel took
part of it and now they're going to
fight to take it back and we can see
that they will take back their land and
we see Russia is assisting we see the
drive to push all foreign troops back as
far as possible and to place Syrian
troops at the border we saw already with
Iraq and Syria they are protecting the
borders this is going to happen around
Syria and they're going to protect the
borders what was planned before by the
deep state is completely falling apart
where they were going to separate Syria
where they were going to have a Kurd
region that are going to have the Shiar
region they're gonna have a Sunni region
that is not happening we see already
there's a political process happening
right now we already see the first stage
of getting a ran out of the country than
having the
coalition forces removed from this area
that is the plan now does this mean that
the coalition forces and the other deep
state factions are gonna go along with
this no they're gonna fight it of course
they are but the plan is to push all of
these out of the country and then have
the troops come home this is the endgame
that they're trying to hit and it looks
like it's on schedule
but again the deep state could do
anything to stop this we've seen it
before
remember these state they want control
over everything they've controlled the
corporate media they've controlled
Facebook they controlled YouTube they
control you know all these different
platforms yes it's a little difficult to
shut things down completely because we
still have the Constitution we still
have the Bill of Rights but if you
notice and on YouTube and on Google and
on Facebook they keep changing the rules
they keep changing the Terms of Service
because they're trying to figure out a
way how to shut down everyone that's
speaking out they're arresting people
now just like Tommy Robinson in the UK
they're doing whatever they possibly can
to shut down anyone that speaks out and
if you go back in time this has been
tried before I mean they just burn books
they said listen we don't want you to
see this so we're just gonna burn it
but people always find a way around this
and again this is all about control who
is gonna control the narrative who's
gonna control what is being said out
there and again we have voices coming
out from all different areas countering
what the corporate media is saying
countering what the intelligence
agencies are saying countering what the
deep state is saying and they always try
to fight back and this is why they came
out with fake news and this is why it
was kind of turned around on them where
they tried to use it to say oh all those
alternative media stations they're all
completely fake phony and false and
we're gonna you know put up fact
checkers and all these other things but
that kind of failed the people will
decide what is true and what is not if
you don't believe something's true don't
listen if you believe it's true then
listen do some research and everyone's
gonna have their own opinions that's
great that's making you think that's
making you say well wait a minute why is
this true that why isn't that true
everyone should be doing this and we see
right now the name of the game is
control and this is what the deep state
has wanted from the very beginning this
is what the central bankers wanted from
the very beginning and if you really
think about it they wanted a one-world
government they wanted a one currency
that was centralized that they
controlled so they can control the world
that was their endgame here and right
now with having all these different
countries their system is decentralized
they don't like this and countries will
eventually break away from their system
there are some countries that want to
break away and have broken away and
there are using different currencies and
bypassing the dollar that's a
decentralized system having all these
countries out there is a decentralized
system they don't like it because each
country can decide on their own what
they want to do this is why they created
the Euro because they wanted a
centralized Europe and Europe right now
doesn't want to be centralized they want
to be decentralized and this is why we
had the brexit in the UK and of course
Soros and the rest they're trying to
have a revote of this brexit because
they don't want the UK voting themselves
away they don't want a decentralized
system and that's the important part
about this is a decentralized system
makes it very hard for the central
bankers to maintain control because to
maintain control over all of it you need
to centralize everything and that's the
main objective here is to decentralize
everything decentralize countries there
should be each each country should be on
their own
there shouldn't be a centralized
currency that they use they should be
their own currency because this will
make it harder for the central bank
establishment this will make it harder
for them to operate once they start to
centralize things that makes it easier
for them and that's what they've done in
the past now it's time to go the
opposite way it's time to decentralize
to make them lose control and we the
people gain control back and they tried
to basically central
is everything with refugees going into
all these different countries trying to
blend everything and the countries
fought back they didn't want this to
happen because they didn't want to be
blended they didn't want to be
centralized and that's what the central
bank that's what the deep state that's
what they've been trying to do for a
very long time they've been trying to
centralize everything even regime change
it is about centralizing their control
over those who are running those
countries the TPP was to centralize
everything by putting a a court system
above governments to control everything
below them so the name of the game is
control and we the people need to take
control back we need to take control
away from the central bank away from the
intelligent agencies away from the
corporate media and decentralize
everything this way you hear voices
coming from everywhere and people can
listen to many different things and make
their decision this is why they've been
trying to get rid of the alternative
media this is why they've been taking
channels down this is why they give
strikes to channels they're trying
everything they possibly can to
eliminate the decentralization so this
is where we are we're at this point
where we need to come together as a
people the left the right doesn't matter
we need to come together as a people and
point to the true enemy the true enemy
is the central bank the true enemy are
those traitors to this country that's
where we need to be pointing those are
the people who are trying to divide us
those are the people that want the
division amongst the people because if
you can keep people divided and fighting
amongst themselves guess what the deep
state the central bank they have the
ability to do whatever they need to do
because no one's looking we're too busy
squabbling over trivial matters and
they're in the background
those people behind the curtain the
central banks and the rest laying down
their new plans preparing to push their
agenda so we as a people we need to come
together not
here in the US around the world we need
to be united we need to come together as
one to fight the common enemy
listen everyone thanks a lot for
listening be well be safe and especially
be prepared thanks a lot
